alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL MOBILE AND SOUTHWESTERN BALDWIN COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of I10 And I65, or 4 miles east of Tillmans Corner, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tillmans Corner, Fairhope, Theodore, Point Clear, and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
